name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popup explanationsâ€”by All you can EAT AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select some text, get a short explanation in a popup. Uses AI so works with jargon, technical terms, and slang no problem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly figure out what a word means just by selecting the text. You don't even need to select exactly right, it will use AI to understand what the word is, and give you a definition in a small popup on the page that goes away if you click anywhere or on the close link.

No login required.
